item.title: Hosting [[help plz ]]
item.dc:creator: @devull devull
item.description:
@devull wrote:

arrrgh FFS use the search bar. anyways.
open your server and click compile then if it says:

starting YOURSERVERNAME on port 5555

now open your client e.g moparscape client then run that. now click log in and in the port type the port it said when it got compiled. now go to www.whatismyip.com now tell your freind to open there client and in the port add the port that it said when you compiled it, now tell them to add the ip and then log in XD and your done and btw USE THE SEARCH BUTTON FIRST

Read full topic
